@RepBrianBabin: #spaceweather interferes with GPS signals and disrupts to our electrical grid during severe events. We have had to be more mindful of its effects of as we have increased our use of satellites for communication & remote sensing. .@RogerMarshallMD discusses why #spaceweather matters to farmers and ranchers. GPS and satellite imagery are vital to to ag producers, and vulnerable to solar weather incidents. READ: https://republicans-science.house.gov/news/opening-statements/opening-statement-rep-roger-marshall-joint-environment-and-space¬†‚Ä¶

So...what is #spaceweather? Essentially fluctuations in magnetic activity on the sun, including solar flares & coronal mass ejections. Charged energy from this activity reaches earth & can interfere w/satellites, GPS & the electric grid. Read more @NWSSWPC  https://www.noaa.gov/education/resource-collections/weather-atmosphere-education-resources/space-weather¬†‚Ä¶
